pages.contact: Contact Grandeur Hotel-Casino - Get in Touch with Us Home Abous Us Casino Contact Us Home Abous Us Casino Contact Us Contact Us Visit Our Casino Frequently Asked Questions What are the check-in and check-out times? Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is by 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request. Do you offer airport shuttle services? Yes, we provide complimentary airport shuttle services for our guests. Please contact us in advance to arrange pickup. What amenities are available at the hotel? Our hotel offers a variety of amenities including a spa, fitness center, swimming pool, fine dining restaurants, and a casino. Is parking available on-site? Yes, we offer free parking for all our guests. Valet parking services are also available. Are pets allowed at the hotel? Unfortunately, pets are not allowed at our hotel, with the exception of service animals. How can I make a reservation? You can make a reservation online through our website or by calling our reservations team at (123) 456-7890. Do you have event or meeting facilities? Yes, we have a range of event and meeting facilities available. Please contact our events team for more details. What is your cancellation policy? Our cancellation policy varies depending on the rate and dates of your reservation. Please refer to your booking confirmation for specific details. Contact Us I accept privacy policy Send Book a stay Home About Us Casino Contact Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Ruan, France +33-01-20-86-97-20 grandeur@gmail.com

pages.privacy-policy: Grandeur Hotel-Casino Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters Home Abous Us Casino Contact Us Home Abous Us Casino Contact Us Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Welcome to Grandeur Hotel-Casino. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your personal information to protect your privacy. 2. Information We Collect When you visit our website or make a reservation, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details. This information is necessary for processing your reservations and providing you with the best service possible. 3. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send booking confirmations, respond to customer service requests, and communicate with you about our services and promotions. 4. Information Sharing We do not share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to process your transactions, comply with legal obligations, or protect our rights. Third parties that provide services on our behalf are required to protect your personal information and use it only for the purposes for which it was disclosed. 5. Security We take appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access to or unauthorized alteration, disclosure, or destruction of data. These include internal reviews of our data collection, storage, and processing practices, as well as security measures to guard against unauthorized access to systems where we store personal data. 6. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, and correct inaccuracies in your personal information in our custody and control, subject to certain exceptions prescribed by law. You may request to access, update, or correct your personal information by contacting us using the contact information below. 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will post any changes on this page, so please review it periodically. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at grandeur@gmail.com. Book a stay Home About Us Casino Contact Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Ruan, France +33-01-20-86-97-20 grandeur@gmail.com
